error_events.description: Safety issue detected: CRITICAL: The camera is completely misaligned, providing no oversight of the robot's operation. This prevents detection of any potential hardware failures, spills, or safety incidents. The presence of beverages would be a violation if this were the lab bench.
error_events.actual_state: CRITICAL: The camera is completely misaligned, providing no oversight of the robot's operation. This prevents detection of any potential hardware failures, spills, or safety incidents. The presence of beverages would be a violation if this were the lab bench.
